name: Dreamwhale II
description:
Gear up, defeat monsters, and kill the king hiding in the castle. If you know the mechanics, it will probably take you about five minutes to complete the game. But getting to know the game is part of the challenge.

Features:

  • 4 different enemies
  • 4 colours
  • 3 different "endings"
  • 3 maps
  • 5 items
  • 1 secret
  • Currency
  • No walls of text, because there is barely enough pixels for that

Known Issues:

  • Sounds can sometimes interfere with each other or are not timed correctly. I need to better plan this in the future and allow the game to pause when sound is playing.

This game is part of the Decade Jam.
